Max Da Costa.Action: Asks the nun if the people from Elysium are different from him, showing curiosity and openness.
Looks at the nun skeptically when told they are not different, indicating questioning but no hostility.
Expresses desire not to get sick and to go to Elysium like the healthy people there.
Moves back to scrubbing, showing persistence and maintaining his role despite difficult circumstances.
Expresses desire to go to Elysium to avoid sickness, indicating awareness of his limitations but no demonstrated skill or plan in this excerpt.
Expresses sense of unfairness about deportation and repatriation.
Determined to become rich to escape hardship.
Says he will be a dealer, influenced by a peer named Pedro.
Max expresses determination to become rich despite his harsh circumstances.
Max decides he will be a dealer based on what he heard, showing a lack of critical thinking about the path he chose.
Max silently accepts the nun’s reprimand without arguing, showing compliance but not confidence or assertiveness.
Slaps children's hands away and catches one child to shake him upside down to get coins.
Jokes sarcastically with gangsters about owed bail money.
Hands a five dollar coin back to a child after teasing him with it.
Confronts gangsters confidently, reminding one of a past debt, showing assertiveness and social awareness.
Catches a child and shakes him down for coins to gauge money availability, demonstrating quick thinking and practical resourcefulness.
Jokes with children and maintains control over the interaction, keeping composure in a potentially chaotic situation.
Ignores the gathering crowd and the hovering aid vehicle without engaging or gathering more information about the situation.
Greets robotic police officers with a friendly 'Good morning' despite tense situation.
Resists police officers trying to grab his bag but does so without aggression, tries to explain calmly he is just going to work.
Smiles and greets robotic police officers cheerily despite being scanned and suspected.
Tries to resist the officer grabbing his backpack and attempts to explain himself.
Fails to avoid being subdued and searched by robotic police officers.
Attempts to de-escalate tension verbally by saying he is just on his way to work and that he doesn't want trouble.
Subdued violently by officers, lies on the floor with bleeding lip, silently observes ELYSIUM far away.
Attempts to get off the train at his stop but is violently subdued and unable to prevent missing his stop.
Does not resist the police droid’s search and accepts the situation despite injury and setback.
Smiles in greeting to nurse Frey despite being in pain and injured.
Insists injury is not his fault when nurse Frey disapproves.
Despite bleeding from his lip, he engages in conversation with Frey, showing social confidence and composure under physical duress.
Appears injured and in a rundown hospital, suggesting vulnerability or disadvantage in current circumstances.
Tries to explain or excuse his injury, indicating self-awareness and communication skills.
Smiles politely after Nurse Frey tells him to stay out of trouble.
Keeps his mouth shut while being stitched up, showing patience and respect.
Apologizes to Foreman and acknowledges his mistakes respectfully.
Keeps calm and silent while being stitched, showing patience and self-control.
Appears respectful and polite to authority figures like the Foreman, admits fault, and accepts discipline without argument.
Smiles and tries to lighten interaction with Frey, showing social confidence.
Has been reprimanded multiple times (third time this month) for presumably the same issue, indicating repeated minor failures.
Replies with a modest, almost apologetic demeanor toward the Foreman, indicating he may lack assertiveness or confidence at work.
Writes 'FUCK THE POLICE' on a robotic police droid's face as an act of defiance.
Skillfully operates assembly line machinery, efficiently loads robotic heads with precision and care.
Carefully monitors surroundings before vandalizing droid heads, indicating situational awareness and tactical caution.
Tries to explain himself calmly to the robot parole officer despite the frustrating situation.
Rejects offered medication to control emotions, showing desire to stay genuine.
Expresses frustration internally by clenching jaw and flexing hands under table.
Grabs and throws a knife impulsively, causing harm.
Attempts to speak and explain himself calmly during parole hearing despite robotic interruptions.
Rejects offered medication to control physiological responses, showing some self-control.
Mocks the parole officer by imitating a robot voice sarcastically.
Responds aggressively by standing up and grabbing his backpack after being warned.
Shrugs off concern from lifelong friend Julio about his injuries with minimal explanation.
Attempts to avoid a serious conversation with his friend Julio by preemptively rejecting the topic.
Mocks the robot parole officer with sarcasm and a robot voice, showing confidence and defiance.
Stops Julio preemptively to avoid hearing a plea or advice, showing social awareness and control over the conversation.
Gets physical by standing up aggressively and grabbing his backpack after the parole meeting, indicating readiness and assertiveness.
Shrugs off injury (his lip) and downplays it as 'the usual', showing resilience but possibly ignoring physical consequences.
Fails to fully engage or elaborate when questioned about recent behavior, giving short or evasive answers, indicating possible lack of transparency or avoidance.
Laughs with Julio at the joke about rap career, displaying camaraderie.
Rejects Julio’s drug selling plan firmly and highlights his parole anklet, showing responsibility and sincerity about his limits.
Uses insults like 'idiot' and 'bitch' during the exchange with Julio.
Forcefully escorts Julio out after the heated banter, maintaining boundaries but in a blunt way.
Questions Julio’s poorly prepared pitch, showing skepticism and critical thinking.
Clearly acknowledges his parole anklet and the consequences of breaking the law, demonstrating awareness and realistic planning.
Laughs off Julio’s taunts and keeps control of the conversation, showing social confidence and emotional composure.
Dismisses Julio’s plan with a firm boundary and ejects him from his house, showing assertiveness and decisiveness.
Laughs off Julio's attempt to persuade him to leave and firmly shuts the door on him.
Shows resistance to temptation or distraction by refusing Julio's offer to buy weed and leave.
Notices the kiln door is jammed and seeks help from a coworker.
Tries to warn about and fix the jammed door despite foreman's disregard and worker's dismissal.
Attempts to squeeze through the dangerous gap to solve the problem rather than ignoring it.
Shows hesitation and nervousness about risking himself but proceeds to help fix the issue.
Does not attempt to get others involved or seek assistance beyond asking the worker once.
Attempts to fix a jammed door by squeezing through a small gap carefully despite objections and risk, showing resourcefulness and willingness to act under pressure.
Fails to successfully reset or properly fix the door, leading to it shutting and activating the kiln, causing injury and halting production.
Bangs hysterically on the glass and screams for help after getting trapped, showing panic and lack of calm problem-solving in an emergency.
Responds to the nun calmly and honestly, expressing feelings and pain without aggression.
Keeps the nun’s locket and closes his fingers around it, showing trust and appreciation.
Slumps and squints in sunlight, showing vulnerability without hostility.
Remains unconscious while being dragged by the robotic pincer, showing vulnerability and lack of immediate control.
As a young boy, despite his injuries and difficult circumstances, expresses a clear goal and desire to go to Elysium, indicating some level of focus and aspiration.
Closes his fingers around the nun's pendant, signaling a moment of emotional acceptance and possibly mental resilience or grounding.
Grips and crushes the bed linen tightly upon hearing his terminal prognosis.
Grips and crushes bed linen tightly upon hearing his prognosis, tries to control his breathing and grit his teeth to endure pain and fear.
Lies passively in the med bay after radiation exposure, showing no immediate attempt to act or resist the situation beyond internal control.
Does not push away or rebuff curious children despite his weakness.
Steps out of the factory despite extreme physical weakness and nausea, showing determination.
Steps over the security line, triggering sentry guns aimed at him, indicating poor situational awareness.
Recognizes the danger once guns aim at him and steps back, avoiding further conflict.
Is too weak to manage or disperse curious children in the favela, showing physical incapacity affecting his ability to act.
Hobbles slowly and tries to maintain balance despite sickness, demonstrating grit and some physical control.
Tells gangsters to leave to have a private moment with Julio despite his weakness.
Refuses Julio’s offer of money, emphasizing his focus on the mission rather than taking advantage of friendship.
Uses harsh language towards the gangsters ("get the fuck out", "hey, asshole") when stressed and sick.
Greets the bouncer and insists on getting in despite being sick.
Collapses into a chair, knocking over items carelessly.
Honesty about being sick and needing help, offers to pay back later.
Knows where he is going in a hostile environment, clearly has been here before.
Collapses into a chair, knocking over cans, bottles, and a keyboard in a tense situation.
Approaches Spider to negotiate despite being obviously sick and weakened, showing determination and some confidence.
Approaches Spider with a sincere, desperate request for help, acknowledging past loyalty and asking earnestly.
Gets physically close to Spider to emphasize earnestness and personal connection.
Approaches Spider directly and asks for help, showing persistence despite initial rejection.
Clearly communicates his urgency (terminal illness) to persuade Spider to reconsider.
Shows confidence by getting close to Spider and making a personal appeal.
Relies heavily on Spider's decision and does not attempt alternate strategies or solutions when initially rejected.
Rejects a risky plan to hijack a billionaire and steal data, showing caution and distrust.
Seeks reassurance by asking Spider to swear on his children's life about the promise of a clean ID and cure.
Asks about the failure rate of the risky data extraction procedure, showing awareness of technical difficulties and risks.
Voices skepticism about the ability to even access the hospital to install the neural port, indicating practical knowledge and critical thinking.
Rejects the initial hijacking plan outright ('Fuck that.') before fully understanding or analyzing alternative options.
Asserts control over the mission team size to avoid betrayal and protect group cohesion.
Insists on Julio getting another ticket despite Spider's reluctance, showing loyalty or care for his companion.
Threatens Spider implicitly by saying 'Good luck finding somebody else' if Julio is not included, showing firmness but no direct hostility.
Selects and insists on a small, trusted team of four to avoid internal betrayal, showing cautious planning and leadership.
Identifies the true target (John Carlyle) when others only have vague guesses, demonstrating insight and intelligence.
Successfully negotiates for an additional ticket despite resistance, asserting control and confidence.
Encourages Julio and shows determination about their plan, getting close to Julio to emphasize urgency.
Watches Frey leave after she escapes a thug, their eyes meet but he does not intervene or call out.
Presses Julio for a faster way to get up there and confidently asserts this is their ticket out.
Positioning himself as a confident actor in the dangerous environment of Spider's lair, maintaining eye contact with Frey without flinching.
Remains stoic and silent despite pain and threats during forced surgery.
Max gives Julio a thumbs up and smiles, showing confidence and ability to communicate reassurance under pressure.
Max quietly allows a surgical operation (cerebral scan) without struggle or resistance, showing composure in a traumatic situation.
As a young boy, Max obeys an older gang leader's command to steal from a girl, showing compliance but also embarrassment and hesitation.
Sneaks into the girl's room and steals her watch.
Runs away knocking the girl over as she asks him to give back the watch.
Sneaks close to the house, hides behind a wall, and creeps into the girl's room to steal a watch.
Runs away hastily when confronted by the girl and knocks her over in his escape.
Slowly removes his bandages despite Julio's warning, showing possible impatience or a lack of caution.
Reciprocates a gangsta style shake with Manuel, showing camaraderie.
Practices using a weapon handed to him without hesitation.
Reciprocates gangsta style handshake confidently; quickly evaluates the weapon and practices using its special attachment effectively.
Asks directly where the guns are, showing situational awareness and focus.
Reassures Julio to relax and that the plan is going to work.
Admits to Julio that he is actually nervous too despite appearing confident.
Coordinates a complex plan over walkie-talkie clearly and confidently, showing leadership and strategic thinking.
Reassures Julio to stay calm despite both feeling nervous, showing emotional control and situational awareness.
Acknowledges his own fear openly after initial calm facade, demonstrating self-awareness but potentially undermining confident front.
Smiles at his friend, sharing a moment of lightheartedness and camaraderie.
Opens fire on the limo despite knowing the bullets are ineffective against composite materials.
Quickly reacts to the sentry gun firing by diving away to avoid damage.
Dodges grenade shrapnel and uses a proximity fuze device effectively to destroy the droid.
Quickly orders Sandro to cut open the limo door after neutralizing the threat, showing situational awareness and command.
Leaps to protect Sandro by body-checking the droid and wrestles it to prevent harm.
Tosses jammed gun and immediately leaps at the droid using enhanced suit power to physically engage it and wrestle it away from Sandro and the laser device.
Gun jams at a critical moment, failing to fire when needed.
Body-checks the droid, wrestles it using his synthetic strength, ultimately tearing the droid's head off to disable it.
Tosses the dismantled upper metal carcass of the droid into the weeds without hesitation, efficiently disposing of evidence.
Slaps the gun away from Carlyle to prevent suicide.
Forces Carlyle to connect data cable against his will.
Slaps the gun away from a desperate CEO moments before he can commit suicide, preventing failure of the mission.
Quickly and skillfully plugs data cables into both the injured CEO and himself to enable syncing despite tense circumstances.
Monitors the data transfer closely, reacts promptly to the progress and incoming threat with focused attention.
Responds with alarm and confusion when transfer fails, indicating a lack of prior awareness of possible data corruption.
Grabs Sandro’s shirt and pleads for him to stay, showing desperation to keep the team together.
Shouts at Sandro to come back and insists on the importance of the data despite the danger.
Resists Julio trying to pull him to safety because he’s focused on the data, ignoring his own wellbeing.
Insists on retrieving crucial data despite danger, showing determination and understanding of its importance.
Refuses to leave with Sandro, attempts to physically stop him, but is overwhelmed and dragged away, indicating limited control of the situation.
Collapses due to seizures induced by the data overload, unable to continue fleeing or acting effectively.
Drags unconscious Julio out to safety from the burning, flipped car despite his own injuries.
Attempts to save his friend pathetically even under extreme duress and pain.
Desperately tries to reload and continue fighting to protect his friend Julio.
Reacting with visible anguish and desperation over Julio's death, calling to him and trying to save him.
Immediately turns back to his fallen friend rather than escaping, showing concern and loyalty.
Fumbles while trying to reload his gun under pressure, struggling to focus after being fatally wounded.
Acts quickly to reload and fire at Kruger despite serious injury, showing persistence and willingness to fight on.
Does not recognize or counter Kruger’s deflector device in time, resulting in ineffective attacks.
Attempts to save his friend Julio and shows desperate concern, but ultimately fails to prevent Julio’s death.
Manages to limp away from the fight despite severe injury, indicating survival instinct and some resilience.
Allows an old woman to cover him with her donkeys to hide from pursuers, accepting help nonverbally.
Is silent and non-confrontational despite being severely injured and hunted.
Despite being wounded, Max pulls himself up and limps toward the hospital, knowing exactly where he needs to go for help.
Struggles on the verge of death in a crowd that ignores him, shows determination to find and follow Frey despite extreme pain.
Takes cover under a dumpster to avoid detection by a UAV.
Watches the surroundings with eagle-like focus, especially monitoring the cop and hospital.
Makes an effort to continue moving despite severe injury and pain to reach Frey.
Collapses onto a knee in the alley due to exhaustion and injury.
Calls out to Frey and pleads for help despite his injuries, showing vulnerability and trust.
Begging Frey not to leave him or get medics involved to avoid danger to himself, showing desperation and sincere plea for aid.
Refuses medical treatment and tries to involve Frey personally rather than accepting system help, indicating a distrust in institutional help but also a reliance on a specific person.
Forces himself to stand on shaky legs despite severe injury and exhaustion, shows determination to continue despite physical limits.
Refuses immediate medical help even when seriously wounded, fearing for his safety, insists on finding and relying on Frey instead.
Unable to convince Frey to help him or to get professional medical aid, collapses and shows vulnerability.
Cooperates with Frey to manage his life-threatening wound despite being weak and in pain.
Responds briefly and politely with 'ok' when asked to help with his own medical care.
Attempts to push his wound closed to help himself despite his weakening condition.
Tries to push the wound area shut with his hand despite becoming weak.
Complies with Frey's instruction to put pressure on the wound and help out.
His hand slides away and he becomes unconscious, unable to maintain pressure effectively.
Reassures Julio they will always be friends despite their difficult circumstances.
Thanks Frey sincerely after waking up wounded.
Slams his fist down in frustration after hearing his prognosis, causing a mess that Frey has to clean up.
Declares determination to live in Elysium despite skepticism and social ridicule.
Shows emotional frustration and slams fist on tray after hearing he has only days to live, displaying difficulty managing pressure.
Expresses gratitude to Frey and acknowledges his vulnerable condition realistically.
Maintains a supportive friendship with Julio, showing social awareness and steadiness.
Greets Matilda warmly and tries to connect by offering a handshake playfully.
Shows concern and admiration by calling Matilda beautiful and asking about her father.
Expresses frustration and defensiveness about his past but insists he is trying to live decently.
Engages gently and respectfully with sick child Matilda, attempts to make her comfortable despite awkwardness.
Shows surprise and uncertainty when asked to help with Matilda’s critical medical situation, indicating momentary lack of confidence.
Insists on having tried to live a decent life despite circumstance and danger, reflecting self-awareness and personal effort.
Agrees to help Frey and take her daughter despite his own limitations and uncertainty.
Looks away when Frey expresses gratitude, indicating some emotional reservation but still cooperative.
Watches Frey leave without responding to her emotional statement, showing restraint but not warmth.
Considers the request carefully and agrees to help Frey's daughter despite limited resources.
Accepts responsibility to watch the girl and prepares to get up and assist.
Suffers a mini seizure, becomes physically overwhelmed and breaks medical equipment in frustration.
Despite physical and emotional distress, pauses to collect himself and focus his thoughts after the seizure.
Watches Matilda sleeping quietly without waking her.
Acknowledges shared pain with Matilda by noting they both have bandages.
Responds briefly and somewhat dismissively to Matilda's invitation to share her story.
Expresses a cynical view about the story's hopeful ending, contradicting Matilda's optimism.
Steals money from Frey's room and thanks God quietly for it.
Searches Frey's room quietly and efficiently, finds hidden money, and secures it on his person.
Responds calmly and reassuringly to Matilda's questions despite awkwardness.
Reflects silently and somewhat pessimistically on Matilda's story about cooperation.
Stops briefly, conflicted before walking away silently
Yells 'Christ! Leave me alone!' at the UAV
Throws rocks at UAV to disable it and escape
Stops and hides under a narrow overpass to evade UAV detection, successfully escaping.
Throws rocks at the UAV to disable a propeller, achieving a hit after several misses.
Rushes off abruptly without informing others, showing conflicted behavior and leaving abruptly.
Effortlessly chokes out a bodyguard who tries to stop him, pushes aggressively to get what he wants.
Shows determination and urgency to help others piled up in poor condition, insists on arranging transport despite obstacles.
Effortlessly chokes out a bodyguard blocking his path and pushes forward to confront Spider directly.
Slams down cash to pay for urgent travel, showing resourcefulness and determination.
Fails to comprehend or respond effectively when Spider explains that the flight system is jammed, appearing desperate and momentarily paralyzed.
Shows frustration and anguish about the situation but is open to Spider’s help and lowers his defenses to allow a scan of his head.
Responds with anger and aggression when accused of corrupting data and indirectly causing harm.
Collapses forward in frustration and anguish, unable to immediately respond to critical questions, showing emotional overwhelm and distraction.
Engages with Spider’s suggestion to scan his head despite initial hesitation, showing openness to problem solving and adaptation.
Expresses confusion and distress about the data and protocol in his head, indicating struggle to understand complex technical information.
Chuckles coldly and rejects a risky plan to break into the mainframe, refusing to participate in what he sees as a suicide mission.
States bluntly that he only needs a ride and treats the other character as a means to an end, being aggressive and dismissive.
Pushes Spider roughly, knocking him into tables and computers after Spider tries to stop him.
Threatens to blow up the grenade attached to his head if demands are not met, showing resolve but also intimidation.
Walks through a crowd of desperate refugees looking to Spider for help without engaging or acknowledging them.
Quickly evades Spider's attempt to plant a tracking chip with a sleight of hand and pushes him back aggressively.
Confidently threatens to blow up a grenade to leverage a deal for a ticket up to Elysium.
Effortlessly fights off multiple attackers using his enhanced physical abilities and advanced technology.
Boldly walks through a crowd of desperate refugees without hesitation, showing calm under pressure.
Yells and waves arms to get attention of the shuttle so they come back for him
Yells into UAV lens to communicate despite risk, showing sincere effort to be heard.
Throws UAV to the dirt and stands in the path of the shuttle to confront Kruger with a grenade, demonstrating boldness but also threatening harm.
Warns Kruger to obey him or face consequences, indicating controlling and confrontational behavior.
Threatens to blow up the shuttle and himself if Kruger makes a move.
Seems stunned and speechless when Frey accuses him and Kruger restrains her.
Challenges Kruger to release Frey and questions why she is involved.
Commands Kruger to fly him up for medical attention immediately, demonstrating urgency and control in a dangerous situation.
Threatens to blow up the shuttle and himself if Kruger makes any move against him, showing confidence and leverage.
Holds grenade tightly while entering a tense situation, prepared for conflict if needed.
Stands speechless and stunned when confronted by Frey’s accusations, indicating possible momentary loss of composure or being caught off guard.
Questions Kruger insistently about Frey’s involvement, trying to understand the situation despite emotional shock.
Looks at Frey and attempts to speak but says nothing, seeming deeply conflicted.
Meets Matilda’s fearful eyes but looks away, gripping a grenade tightly.
Grips the grenade tightly, remains silent and deeply conflicted during tense moments on the ship approaching Elysium, showing internal control and awareness of the gravity of the situation.
Attempts to communicate with Frey but does not follow through effectively or take assertive action.
Protects Matilda by covering her ears and holding her tightly during the explosion, making a decisive and brave move to throw the grenade and stop the threat.

Makes an impossible decision to throw a grenade toward the cockpit amid a dangerous reentry and crashing situation, acts quickly to protect Matilda and Frey by covering her ears and bracing for impact.
Reassures Matilda by saying 'She’s fine, I got her' and tries to help Frey get out of the harness
Acts quickly and accidentally opens rear bay doors, letting in light and air, which helps in the crisis situation
Pulls himself upright despite the wrecked and sparking jet, showing physical resilience and focus.
Holds Matilda and reassures her, demonstrating calmness under pressure.
Tries to free Frey from the harness by pressing switches and buttons, accidentally opening the bay doors and letting in dangerous fire and embers.
Looks around quickly, notices Crowe beginning to rise, showing awareness of surroundings.
Uses his strength and martial arts skills to disarm and incapacitate Crowe, stopping a violent threat.
Immediately moves back inside to help Frey after neutralizing Crowe.
Uses Crowe's shotgun to defend himself and ultimately shoots Kruger at point-blank range to stop the threat.
Deflects multiple throwing knives thrown by Kruger with quick reflexes.
Pulls the blade from his stomach immediately after being injured and prepares to fight again.
Uses his exo-suit augmented limbs as shields to block a sword attack.
Finds tactical webbing to locate Crowe's shotgun in a desperate moment.
Uses Crowe's shotgun as a shield to shatter the KATANA in slow motion.
Delivers a powerful kick knocking Kruger back effectively.
Steps up confidently to a weakened enemy and executes the final shot decisively.
Drops the gun after shooting Kruger and immediately remembers Frey, prioritizing her safety.
Fires at control panel to free Frey and makes efforts to protect her and Matilda.
Urgently pleads with Frey to escape with him to survive, showing concern and sincerity.
Grabs Matilda and pulls Frey to run to safety, acting protectively and responsibly.
Protects Frey and Matilda by shooting at attacking droids, showing leadership and concern for their safety.
Keeps moving forward despite being in serious pain, encouraging others to keep going.
Laughs with relief after escaping danger, shares a quiet moment appreciating the beauty of Elysium with Prey, and listens to the children's request to stay.
Enters the children's room silently, showing a flashback to his orphanage, suggesting inner pain but no outward emotional barrier here.
Shatters a window to gain entry to the mansion quickly and leads the group inside.
Silently peers over the windowsill to observe the enemy Raven leaving, showing situational awareness and caution.
Walks around and takes in the house calmly after the danger has passed, demonstrating confidence and composure.
Doubles over in pain suddenly, indicating physical weakness and inability to control his own body effectively.
Max looks at Frey and Matilda, touches the Armani logo calmly before the medical upgrade begins.
Rejects Spider's attempt to stop re-atomization despite Spider's concern and pleas, pushes Spider away aggressively.
Shows intense emotional outburst and desperation about his condition.
Threatens Spider and angrily demands him to leave, even as others are distressed.
Pauses to look at Matilda when she has a seizure, showing attention to others' distress.
Looks at Frey and Matilda and decides to help despite knowing his own broken body and limitations.
Considers the risks but decides to proceed with the plan to help Matilda despite his broken condition, showing determination and understanding of the situation.
Looks down at his ID chip and acknowledges its limitations (coded to his DNA), indicating awareness of technical constraints.
Does not hesitate after confirming with Spider that the action will help Matilda and commits to proceeding.
Looks over at Frey and Matilda, concerned about the plan working and its benefits for them.
Looks over the map carefully and contemplates the plan before proceeding.
Asks Spider if the plan will work and if it will give them what they need, showing thoughtful consideration.
Offers to take the lead and actively participates in preparing for the dangerous mission, showing willingness to engage and protect the team.
Is hesitant and struggles to express himself briefly to Frey, showing vulnerability and sincere intentions.
Checks the breach with his AK47 before moving in, takes the headset and prepares for the mission confidently.
Stands ready and listens closely to Spider and Frey while gearing up calmly and efficiently.
Begins to speak to Frey but trails off, showing some hesitation.
Uses a flashlight to locate the hatch and jumps into the substructure confidently with others.
Cautiously checks the smoky room with his gun, waves it side to side before proceeding.
Hears a scream and quickly spins around reacting to danger caused by Kruger.
Tells Spider not to leave Manuel, shows concern for his friend.
Risks personal safety by attacking Kruger to protect others.
Fights to defend Manuel and Spider despite overwhelming odds.
Focuses on escaping after injuring Kruger, leaving Spider behind momentarily.
Delivers martial arts moves to give Spider time to escape, showing a protective instinct.
Stops to watch Kruger, acknowledging him as a relentless killer, indicating recognition but no malice or hatred.
Engages Kruger and fights desperately to stop him, holding onto what he fights for rather than purely rage or revenge.
Teares the nerve center off Kruger's suit to disable him, followed by kicking him brutally.
Delivers skilled martial arts moves that initially disable Kruger, allowing his own escape.
Calmly assesses the situation despite Kruger's relentless pursuit, showing mental composure.
Makes a desperate but skillful move to tear off the nerve center on Kruger's suit, disabling his power source.
Stops temporarily to watch Kruger approach, hesitating despite immediate danger.
Seems confused after Kruger hints that Max's friend did not tell him everything, indicating possible gaps in Max's understanding.
Expresses rage and devastation after Kruger’s death, showing emotional vulnerability.
Confronts Spider emotionally, asking 'How could you do this to me?'
Refuses to accept dying passively, struggles with the choice presented to him.
Hurls Kruger's body off the gantry in rage, showing emotional impulsiveness rather than calm, calculated behavior.
Despite knowing the risk to his life, he chooses to go toward the Medbay to attempt to save himself and others, showing determination and willingness to act under pressure.
Stumbles toward the Medbay and hesitates at the machine before turning away, indicating uncertainty and possible lack of readiness to act decisively.
Clumsily plugs USB into his head, calmly looks back at Earth and remembers the locket on his neck, snaps it off holding it, apologizes to Prey sincerely for stealing her watch.
Decides to move forward toward the protocol room despite injury (limps toward Spider and says 'Let's finish this').
Collapses next to the central computer but remains mentally focused, calmly interacting with Spider and Prey.
Clumsily plugs USB wire into his own head, showing some awkwardness with technology.
Removes locket and holds it while maintaining composure, showing emotional control under pressure.
Asks Frey for forgiveness and sincerely apologizes for stealing Matilda’s money.
Thanks Frey before pressing the enter key, showing gratitude in a tense situation.
Takes the keyboard from Spider and decisively hits the ENTER key to complete the system encoding despite the high stress and imminent danger.
Engages in a somewhat distracted or conflicted conversation about stealing money amid a crisis, potentially indicating divided focus.
Max shows defiance and resilience as a child by sticking out his tongue at the Warden despite being beaten and humiliated.
Max fails to physically defend himself against the Warden’s punch and collapses gasping for air.
Max endures the harsh treatment silently afterward, indicating mental toughness and survival instinct.
